lenders.name: Stephanie

lenders.name: Monica

lenders.name: julie
lenders.loan_because:
even a small amount from me can make a positive impact in someone else's life.
Thank you for allowing me this gift in my life.

lenders.name: jim
lenders.loan_because: Free handouts do not work, teach a man to fish and can eat for a lifetime as long as someone doesn't poison the water.  Give a man a fish and he will sit and wait for another one.
lenders.occupational_info: try to be more and more like Jesus every day.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I know the feeling of having the weight lifted from your shoulders after receiving a much needed loan to secure an opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: I create computer programs.

lenders.name: Opal
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others help their children. Thanks to the Kensington kids who donated $5.00.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a 6th grade student in the fall.

lenders.name: Margit
lenders.loan_because: I want to decrease unnecessary suffering through small acts of kindness.

lenders.name: Monika
lenders.loan_because: I support the idea of giving people access to loans in order to achieve their goal of becoming more self-sustainable
lenders.occupational_info: I am a full-time mom of 2 school aged boys and a part-time figure skating coach.  I also work part-time at the local community centre and do volunteer work at my sons' school.

lenders.name: Nate Rosenberg
lenders.occupational_info: Because they have a lot of employees, businesses need bigger Internet connections than individual homes. My company provides large connections between offices and to the public Internet.

lenders.name: Taher
lenders.loan_because: It helps others help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I make the internet work better.

lenders.name: Heike
lenders.loan_because: This is a great way to help others to help themselves.

lenders.name: Lara
lenders.loan_because: I have a desire to help people who want to help themselves
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the United Nations as an accountant

lenders.name: Kathleen

lenders.name: Iris
lenders.loan_because: It makes a difference to somebody.

lenders.name: The Laughlin Family
lenders.occupation: 11 and 9 year old kids and teacher
lenders.loan_because: I don't want my children thinking "It's all about me."  For the world to become a better place, they should learn "It's all about we.."
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a high school biology teacher.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: in North America we are the richest and most miserable people on earth! We have far too much STUFF and it's not making us happy.  Giving is more fun than getting! If I can bless someone from my abundance, I receive far more than I give.
lenders.occupational_info: I am raising five beautiful daughters.  I am not working right now but am searching for part-time work that will allow me to still be here for my girls.

lenders.name: Angel
lenders.loan_because: It's an honor, a joy, and a responsibility to help others in this world in which we all live.

lenders.name: Shelby
lenders.loan_because: giving should be a way of life :)

lenders.name: MARTHA
lenders.loan_because: ITS AN HONOR TO HELP IN A SMALL WAY

lenders.name: Lee-Ellen
lenders.loan_because: Here in the USA, we make important improvements to our lives through cautious loans (such as our home, car, and educational loans); why not help other people do the same!
lenders.occupational_info: I tell stories to kids and adults, and teach storytelling too.

lenders.name: Marylou
lenders.loan_because: there is a satisfaction in knowing for such a small amount invested, someone across the world can better their life
lenders.occupational_info: The Lord enlisted the help of ordinary men who were poor and hard working - He served the less fortunate and all He asked for was our faithfulness. He went to the Cross so we could live with our sins forgiven. Being a part of Kiva allows me to give back in  small measure, for what He did for all of us.

lenders.name: Inge
lenders.loan_because: I think it is a good way to help people earn their own money. I have enough money to live on.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others
lenders.occupational_info: now retired

lenders.name: Kathrin
lenders.occupational_info: I write science texts and children books. I published one children book but hope to get published more, so I earn my money wirting scientific texts which I enjoy too.

lenders.name: Alexa
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: Student at Georgetown University Law Center

lenders.name: Laura and Huu
lenders.loan_because: We have the opportunity to work to improve our lives and want to help others who want to work and improve their lives, too.
lenders.occupational_info: We help cleanup contamination in the environment.

lenders.name: Len
lenders.loan_because: Microfinance seems to me one of the best ways to improve people's lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying physics, to understand the way the universe works.

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: My daughter gave me this for Mother's Day and I intend to continue to loan to help people lead better lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I worked in a factory, am now retired and have since worked for Greenpeace and am on the Oceanside Housing Commission, which provides affordable housing for our residents.

lenders.name: Leslie
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed I am not rich. But if you are making it in today's society, you give by helping and paying it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: I love to educate people on insurance. It is lots of concentration and paperwork.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: The Event industry believes we should help others as we were
lenders.occupational_info: My occupation : Floral and Event Designer

lenders.name: Neil

lenders.occupational_info: https://www.linkedin.com/in/neilrtucker

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: Everyone knows the Dollar isn't what it used to be however, as we can readily see, there are many places in the world where a Dollar still goes a very long way.  This is an excellent intermediate step for me on my way to becoming a philanthropist.

lenders.name: WLC
lenders.loan_because: I WANT TO HELP

lenders.name: BigChefonline
lenders.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur. The access to capital is a challenge for small business owners, but the success of a business improve the quality of live of many people.

lenders.name: Farrah
lenders.loan_because: I have faith in people.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a bio-pharmaceutical company.

lenders.name: Lilla
lenders.loan_because: it's the least I can do.

lenders.name: Kepes Family
lenders.loan_because: Its one small way to effect social change
lenders.occupational_info: Changing the world - or trying to

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: Reading the stories truly inspires me to help those in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I aid doctors in treating their patients through specimen analysis.

lenders.name: Ray - Austin
lenders.loan_because: It's a great supplement to charity, teaching, reinforcing personal responsibility and the value it brings.

lenders.name: Melody and Simon
lenders.loan_because: we care.
lenders.occupational_info: Melody is the Executive Director for a non-profit organization that's mission is to foster a secular society based on science, reason, freedom of inquiry, and humanist values. Simon works as a Marketing Director.

lenders.name: Marcia & Larry
lenders.loan_because: giving a hand up is a great lesson to teach our children.
lenders.occupational_info: We help people sell the home they currently own or find a home to live in.

lenders.name: virginia
lenders.loan_because: i'm not well off by western standards, and struggle a bit to maintain a certain standard of living, with all the things i think i need to be comfortable, like phones and internet connections and a nice (rental) roof over my head and food in the fridge (i work at self sufficiency) and dvd and so on... so this is a kind of a reality check and a remonder that no matter how much i think I am struggling, by the standards of the working poor I am privileged, in very many respects, and i have enough to share. The entrepreneurial spirit demonstrated by these business people in developing countries is admirable, and kiva enables me to assist in a very simple, non bureaucratic way... cutting out the middle man, anyone who might want to take a piece of what i want to loan freely to who i choose...
lenders.occupational_info: I am technically unemployed (due to personal circumstances), but work freelancing creating websites from home. I do some gardening for other local people sometimes. I have trained as a yoga teacher. I am an artist, and I write. I hope one day to publish. I live on a small 5 acre property, which i rent with 4 others, and we run a very small number of cattle, some for beef, some for dairy. I make butter and yoghurt and cheese from our cow, rosie.  Since i don't work, I manage most of the farming activities and the house. I grow vegetables and we have chickens for eggs.

lenders.name: Dina
lenders.loan_because: I know how hard it is to be self-employed and how rewarding it is. This is a small way that I can give back to help other women, especially in my field, who desire to be self-reliant.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a self-employed hairstylist and colorist taking care of clients haircare needs and all aspects of running a business,from ordering products and supplies to managing the books.

lenders.name: Valerie
lenders.loan_because: I know it makes a difference to those who need it.

lenders.name: Lindsey
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Rumi
lenders.loan_because: I want to support women in developing countries who often face disadvantages in accessing resources in their societies.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm working with data everyday--economic, political, demographic--to find patterns of social facts.

lenders.name: LOMO
lenders.loan_because: I want to be a support to someone else, it makes me feel good knowing I can reach out.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: it's necessary  as one human being to another  to accept our fragile existence. i am truly  elated when that choice positively impacts all of us.
lenders.occupational_info: to survive , we have to meet the worlds demands . so everything has to be transported.

lenders.name: alison
lenders.occupational_info: I teach young children

lenders.name: Ken
lenders.loan_because: It is people helping people. I feel much better giving to a person in need with a dream and goal than a government without a prayer.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on equipment fixing it to help keep our country secure.

lenders.name: Nikki
lenders.loan_because: I care!
lenders.occupational_info: I stay at home and raise my children.

We are delighted to be able help people who struggle to be independent and earn a decent living in coutries where this is so difficult .  Each of us has different God-given gifts and together we work as a team to help change the world
lenders.occupational_info: My work involves Reiki healing and flower essence remedies which are vibrational essences to assist people with emotional, spiritual, mental and physical challenges that most of us face in our daily lives.

lenders.name: Kathrin
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a great and efficient way to help people help themselves.

lenders.name: Reinhold
lenders.loan_because: we had hard times but are doing better, so we give to others because we live in a wealthy country
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a helpline for computer problems

lenders.loan_because: I wish to support people who want to better their lives and this way their initiative can stretch beyond themselves and to other people in the same situation, when the money paid back are lent out again.
lenders.occupational_info: Scriptwriter

lenders.name: Douglas
lenders.loan_because: For me it's nothing, for the people whom I'll be lending to this is their chance.
lenders.occupational_info: DJing is my passion, my tech support job pays my bills...;)

lenders.name: Kazeem
lenders.loan_because: I wish to meet my ends need and to start an investmnet before I started producing children, to put my family in a well sound financial status.
lenders.occupational_info: Well, I am earning salary but all goes on food and transportation. So I wish to use the loan to get a bus and use it for transportation withing the Nigeria capital, Abuja were I am currently staying.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I hope that someone - who perhaps hasn't had access to the opportunities I have had - will be able to use my funds to do something good, for themselves and their families. Hopefully my funds will help people create new businesses or grow their existing businesses to generate more funds for many years to come. Good luck!
lenders.occupational_info: I am in my final year of university, studying accounting and finance. I also teach at university.

lenders.name: Alexander
lenders.loan_because: We spend so much money on unnecessary things - why not invest in something reasonable

lenders.name: Saija
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I want to help especially women and girls for better life.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I am very blessed in my life. I feel I should help others when I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit whose mission is to eliminate cruelty and suffering of animals

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: If someone has an idea to improve their standard of living and the initiative to follow it through, I want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I worked for 30 years for Chrysler, an automotive company, in many capacities.  I spent time working with engineers in Brazil, Italy and Mexico.  My longest job assignment was on truck sheet metal parts like doors, hoods and fenders, making sure the design could be stamped and assembled.

lenders.loan_because: We like to help businesses grow and help people in the process.

lenders.name: Debra
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.loan_because: I have sustainable business and help orphans kids.

lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of this project

lenders.name: Lauren
lenders.loan_because: I woudn't see it any other way.

lenders.name: Jacqueline

lenders.name: hubert & brenda

He was a light in our lives that burned brightly albeit for a short time, he taught us to not take living for granted and live life to the fullest.  In his memory we are setting up a fund to help others live a fulfilling life.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a group of folks that work in Information Technology.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: It's great to  have the opportunity to help people who do what they can to help themselves. So little does so much.

lenders.name: Ashley
lenders.loan_because: I care

lenders.name: Daniel & Rachel
lenders.loan_because: We want to help those who have the will but not the resources to get ahead.

lenders.name: Patrick

lenders.occupational_info: I write computer programs that organize data needed by a company that buys and sells electricity, coal, oil, natural gas and other energy related commodities.

lenders.name: Inslee

lenders.loan_because: I want to be socially responsible and I love to see people go into business for themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a graphic designer and businessman.

lenders.name: Catherine
lenders.loan_because: I am so fortunate to live in the US and to have what I need to live.  Other people are not as fortunate.  They deserve to live as well as they can using their talents and skills.  Just a little money can go a long way with these loans.
lenders.occupational_info: I design clothing, sew and knit.  I am also a landscape architect and gardener.  I am passionate about the environment and about equality among all people.

lenders.name: Yuri
lenders.loan_because: We are so blessed to be able to help others in need. Small amount of money can make a significant impact on someone's business and improve their family's life.

lenders.name: Sloane
lenders.loan_because: I have benefited my entire life from the generosity of those around me. It is my greatest pleasure to be able to give back.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a recruiting manager.  I help a large energy  company find people to fill its jobs.

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: there is no reason (other than the violence inherent in the system) why I should have what I do while others have so little. The money I give belongs to me only as the result of an arbitrary distribution.

lenders.name: Kanchan
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I make pretty pictures

lenders.name: Julia
lenders.loan_because: There's really no good reason not to.

lenders.name: Nicholas
lenders.loan_because: I like to know that what I donate goes directly to someone who will use it.
lenders.occupational_info: I make tv and film documentaries about social, cultural and political issues.

lenders.name: Gregory
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me, and so I want to bless others.  Kiva is both a kind and intelligent way to give.

lenders.name: Susanne
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Liz
lenders.loan_because: How can you not?
lenders.occupational_info: We build websites and advertise them online.

lenders.name: Herman H
lenders.loan_because: 3rd world entrepreneurs who deal with infrastructure issues must be encouraged.
lenders.occupational_info: Business consultant working with financial and IT systems for small businesses.

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others be successful.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in farm safety for the Department of Agriculture.  My job is to help farm producers and rural families become aware of farm hazards and take positive steps to reduce or eliminate those hazards.

lenders.name: Melanie
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who are trying to help themselves & their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the Federal Government in Canada. I am married and have a baby girl.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I am immensely thankful for the opportunities I have been given and want to give back to those less fortunate than I.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a good way to let people who need it share in the rich lives that we have in the west.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the fire brigade but not on the fire truck. My work is about preventing fire. Checking buildings, giving out permits and making sure that people know the dangers of fire.

lenders.name: Andy
lenders.loan_because: I feel that we who are better off financially,should help others to also obtain a better and healthier lifestyle
lenders.occupational_info: I started working in 1946 and worked for 46 years and retired in 1993

lenders.name: emmalyn
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with students at a university

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: we are stewards of the world we inhabit, and those of us who have experienced good fortune have an obligation to assist those who wish to attempt to improve their life, or the lives of their family or community.

lenders.name: Malerie and Ted
lenders.loan_because: Because Malerie visited Africa and saw their world first hand.
lenders.occupational_info:
Malerie (daughter) is a DJ and event planner for a local radio station.

Ted (father) is a commercial banker

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: I believe we really can change the world!

lenders.name: kamila, Macielle & Nati
lenders.loan_because: We love to help!!!  A little bit, adds up.

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping those who want to help themselves.  I have been extremely blessed throughout my life and would like to share this with others so they too may feel His powerful love and pass that understanding on to others.
lenders.occupational_info: Entrepreneur - integrating finance, economics, and non-linear analysis to design systems that help solve  or optimize the management of portfolio risk, ecosystems, organ transplant chains,  and other issues

lenders.name: Joyce
lenders.loan_because: God is good.

lenders.name: Dean
lenders.loan_because: I love to see people all over the world have the opportunity to experience thier dream. Nothing is more satisfying to see apparent  hopelessness in peoples eyes turn into excitement, joy and that ultimate feeling of loving security so many  take for granted.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a project manager of large corporate computer technologies.

lenders.name: Maggie
lenders.loan_because: Loaning money is a fantastic way of empowering people to break the cycle of poverty. I like the idea that my money can be used and then reloaned to another person who needs it.

lenders.name: Keino
lenders.loan_because: I should...the world is interconnected. I am blessed to have what I need. I wish the same for everyone.
lenders.occupational_info: Education

lenders.name: Ken
lenders.loan_because: I work in developing countries and want to help out as much as possible. Kiva is a great resource to do this.
lenders.occupational_info: I help United Nations, NGOs, and other organizations with administration, operations, and project coordination.

lenders.name: Elana
lenders.loan_because: I've read too much Utilitarian philosophy. And honestly, what was I going to spend that money on? Comic books, makeup, and video games.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a PhD student working on the art of the Bronze Age Minoan culture.

lenders.name: IIPP Cohort
lenders.loan_because: We wanted to stay close as a cohort while doing something that suits our interests, and aids in International Development. Jackpot!
lenders.occupational_info: Students in International Affairs.

lenders.name: Theodore
lenders.loan_because: I know how it is to try to start a business and not have any capital to fund your idea.
lenders.occupational_info: Very tiring, but fulfilling. I work with Iraqis to help make their communities better.

lenders.name: Denise
lenders.loan_because: I would like to make a difference for others.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide bookkeeping, income tax and business services for small businesses.

lenders.name: kayla
lenders.loan_because: I feel that although I don't have much, I do have more than many people and I should help them out in any way I can.

lenders.name: Tania
lenders.loan_because: Gratitude.  Every day I am grateful that I have been born in a time and place that allows me and my family to prosper.  For me, the next step of truly being grateful is to share with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I buy day old chicks and raise them to laying age.  I then sell some and keep the rest to sell their eggs.

lenders.name: Shelby
lenders.occupational_info: I develop photos from negative film and digital images.  Photography is amazing, and occasionally humbing.  I've been working in this field for 10 years.

lenders.name: allan
lenders.loan_because: we need to help those people to help themselves. This is not a handout. This is helping others to become self sufficient and making a better world.
lenders.occupational_info: We in Canada have so much and it is very important to share with those who have so little. Lets all do a litlle to bring the world up to our standards.

lenders.name: Kalpana
lenders.loan_because: I would like a make a difference with this contribution which may help the economy is a very small way but may go a long way to help someone's life!!

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: It matters. And I can.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I care
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher/student working to improve every aspect of my life and hope to pass along some of the good fortune I have received.

lenders.name: Irina
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a diferrence
lenders.occupational_info: I am helping people to insure their investments for the best terms possible

lenders.name: Nathan
lenders.loan_because: I feel it helps me make a difference to those that are trying very hard to make a better life for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I help maintain the Internet network for a local telecommunications company supplying internet and television services to hundreds of thousands of people.

lenders.name: Bruce and Virginia
lenders.loan_because: We have been fortunate in our lives and want to help others who have been less fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: Teachers who want to practice what we have preached for many years.

lenders.name: Dominick
lenders.loan_because: I believe in a power of ingenuity and hard work
lenders.occupational_info: I own a real estate development company in Canada

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: Because it's easier to "remember the poor" than it is to "forgive my enemies".  Now if I could just remember who said that.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on computers building websites that make businesses more profitable.

lenders.name: Angel
lenders.loan_because: Finding a job here in the Philippines is hard thats why I want to put-up my own buisness

lenders.name: Karin
lenders.loan_because: I read about Kiva and was absolutely enthusiastic about this simple system of helping each other. With a little amount you can really help people to investigate in their future and to help themselves by their own power. They keep their dignity! It´s not just a donation from somebody of the accidentally rich part of the world but a helping each other at eye level.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a machine building company which has lots of work to do right now. My department is in charge of the sites. We send our people to all over the world to build up the machines which our customers buy. One part of  my job is to keep the work of my collegues running by taking care and developing the management system.

lenders.name: Oscar Luis
lenders.occupation: interior designer and novel writer in my freetime
lenders.loan_because: I think it's the best investment that can be done- an investment in people!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm one of three associates in a small company that designs and sells projects of office interior, design and furniture. We had help to start- now I think it's a matter of justice towards whatever or whoever rules this Universe that I pay back the luck I had helping others to do so.

lenders.name: MCTN Family
lenders.loan_because: Its easy to forget that we are part of a much bigger world
lenders.occupational_info: Mum and Dad are a bit unusual and the kids are a bit silly

lenders.name: Horst
lenders.loan_because: The best way of development assistance

lenders.name: Carlijn
lenders.loan_because: I believe we can make a difference and make live better for less fortunate in this world.
lenders.occupational_info: At the moment I'm working as a landeconomist but my passion is to do work in developing countries. In august I'm off to Central -and South  America to learn Spanish and volunteer for 3 months.

lenders.name: Volker
lenders.loan_because: I can, so i do

lenders.name: Victoria
lenders.loan_because: I want the money I give charitably to go further.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm studying at an Australian university to become a doctor.

lenders.name: Holy Trinity Church
lenders.loan_because: The greater Episcopal Church has made a commitment to the Millennium Development Goals initiative, and Holy Trinity Episcopal Church, a mission church located in Brookville, Pennsylvania, has committed a percentage of its budget toward outreach programs that are in accordance with the MDG initiative.
lenders.occupational_info: All the money raised by our church for disbursement by Kiva lenders comes from our annual coffee sale. We sell Pura Vida coffee, and all the profits go toward our outreach account. For any group looking for a great way to raise money, please visit Pura Vida Coffee at  www.puravidacoffee.com/fundraising.php  to learn more.

lenders.name: Florence
lenders.loan_because: This is what God instructs us to do to love others and help them anyway we can. I love you all!
lenders.occupational_info: A missionary of the "Love Walk" with God. Being blessed to be a blessing to others in the world.

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people in any way I can. I think sharing our success with others so that they can have success of their own is the best way to nuture the human spirit.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an English teacher living in Germany. I help people everyday in my classes by teaching them to communicate better. For many of my students, learning English is important for their careers.

lenders.name: Evan
lenders.loan_because: people who have the drive and the ambition to realize a dream should be able to make that dream a reality.

lenders.name: Steffen & Ines
lenders.loan_because: We like to share.

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in somebody else's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am presently a student about to enter university. I am going into international business and would like to help someone get their business started.

lenders.name: Wolfgang
lenders.loan_because: I can - and hope to help.

lenders.name: Make Your Difference.Org
lenders.loan_because: I hope to make a positive difference.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: I started my own business an I want to help those that help themselves and who will eventually help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a small manufacturing company that makes drill bits.

lenders.name: Ravin
lenders.occupational_info: I try to work freelance.

lenders.name: Gunhild
lenders.loan_because:
With a small amount of money you can help people all around the world to improve their lives on their own.

Microfinance is one of the best ways to make the world a better place and the most amazing thing: it works!
lenders.occupational_info: Development cooperation and research on development issues.

lenders.name: Helena
lenders.loan_because: I can and I want to

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people that are less fortunate than my family and I.
lenders.occupational_info: I hire and train associates in a distribution center for a large retailer.  I also work on projects that help increase associate job satisfaction and help develop their sense of purpose.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.occupational_info:
Free / Open-Source Software programmer @ Intel for living, currently still studying at uni.

Contact me at
 "Andrzej Zaborowski " balrogg@gmail.com

lenders.name: Laurel
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I run a program to help 18-23 year-olds transition into the adult world.  They learn building, cooking, gardening, and other hands-on skills, while also discerning their call to serve in the world.

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: It is so easy and rewarding.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the municipality that I live.  I try and get all employees to think more sustainable when making decisions.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: It's the smart way to help people
lenders.occupational_info: I make websites for companies like newspapers and banks

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be in the position to help others when I can.

lenders.name: Matilda
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference to those I otherwise would never meet. I want to impact the world. I want to be more than some self interested American teenager. I want to be able to feel good about at least one part of my life. I want to take part in a sustainable way of helping. I want to BE something.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: "No one is useless in this world who lightens the burdens of another."--Charles Dickens

lenders.name: Leonard
lenders.occupational_info: Copper Canyon, Texas

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: I admire it when people work hard to make a living. I would like to encourage them to keep going with their efforts.
lenders.occupational_info: I organize shipments of machinery spare parts from Germany to Mexico and Brasil.

lenders.name: Colin
lenders.loan_because: Economic prosperity creates healthy communities.
lenders.occupational_info: Our company develops computer software used by teachers, administrators, students, and parents in schools.

lenders.name: puneet
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of sharing money with people who need it.  May this help them lead abundant and prosperous lives and bring them fame and glory. The idea of even a small amount flowing down to people who actually need it and empowering them is absolutely a high for me. Wealth shared only makes it more wealthy and worthy. Thanks for this opportunity Kiva. I hope this brings a smile to an unknown person somewhere in the world and may God Bless you people. Wishing each entrepreneur and lender here as well as Kiva great success.
lenders.occupational_info: Content is my driving force and I have discovered great revenue streams around content and will be having my 2nd office later next month. I also write a weekly tech column for a newspaper, I am the editor of a magazine. I like working in the new economy and discovering new revenue streams and also helping others achieve their dreams.

lenders.name: Kurt
lenders.loan_because: There is only one world...

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: I think that microloaning will someday change the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student, and a social change activist.

lenders.name: Anne Kathrin Maria
lenders.loan_because: I'm dreaming of a better world and do not want it to be just a dream

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: I live in a country with unlimited possibilities compared to many other countries on earth.
lenders.occupational_info: I have been teaching college online since 2011. I have recently started writing plays.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I think it's important that people who want to work and improve their lives have the means to do so.  I also loan in memory of my mother in law, who helped many people over her lifetime.  Both she and I were single mothers, who struggled at times, and wanted to help others who struggle.

lenders.name: Geoff
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good to help someone build their business and become successful.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired from a 30 year career in the insurance business. I also helped start a company from the beginning in 2000 and sold it in 2006.

lenders.name: Efrain
lenders.occupational_info: I promote companies, I teach people how to internet market, I help people with the computer. I work with a friend and help him a lot.  I also learn a lot, most of all my computer knowledge is from the programs and software I use.

lenders.name: Janet
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Josh & Tiea
lenders.loan_because: God calls on all of us to love our neighbors as ourselves -- it's nearly impossible to do, but we must try.
lenders.occupational_info: We import earth-friendly wine from family-owned vineyards in the Mediterranean into the United States.

lenders.name: Jenifer
lenders.loan_because: I have been fortunate and I am very thankful.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in community mental health.

lenders.name: HENRY
lenders.loan_because: I want to invest my time because of the difficulty of working too much hard and load, the accident brought me a limited mobilization.  I have five children and I want to continue working while having the passion of having a grocery store not until somebody could entrust their resources to me. It will be a big hope for my whole family.There's always a minute chances for every striving person in Mindanao , Philippines. There's always be a big challenge here, political and economic, however, your every single penny could give hope and meaning to our lives. I sincerely wanting to loan an amount of $500 for a better start, a grocery store.
lenders.occupational_info: I am very good in public relationship, business is business, can cook great taste food, hard working even as a tenant /machine operator I worked overnight to have an income of $5 dollars a day.

lenders.name: Laurie
lenders.loan_because: Well, I'm not gonna preach. There's a million good reasons for lending with Kiva. Sometimes it's just good to give a little help!
lenders.occupational_info:
I work in the oilsands in northern Alberta, Canada, shipping and receiving industrial material. 
***A proud member of Teamster Local 362!!!!***

lenders.name: tylermhawkins
lenders.loan_because: Life has been very kind to me.

lenders.name: Don
lenders.loan_because: Simply because it is the right thing to do.  I see the face of Jesus in many of those seeking assistance.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a worship leader and social worker -- helping those who are disabled and homeless or at risk of homelessness.

lenders.name: Marcus
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people in other countries that don't have as many opportunities as I do.

lenders.name: Samuel
lenders.loan_because: It's an easy way to promote sustainable change in countries that really need it.

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those in need and try to give them better lives! :)

lenders.name: Roger
lenders.loan_because: As a small business owner I can appreciate the inner drive and strength to take the initiative, and a leap of faith, in creating your own means of income.  That is something that I wholeheartedly support.

lenders.name: Les & Stacey
lenders.loan_because: it is an easy way to make a big difference in someones life who is less fortunate than us.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: *If you have more than you need, you probably have something that belongs to someone else* -- Dr. Kelly Duncan -- my father

lenders.name: Celeste & Sons
lenders.loan_because: My sons (10 and 13) review and decide who to lend to.  This is a learning experience for them, and a wonderful opportunity for them to feel that they can make a valuable impact in someone's World.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a Portfolio and Program Mgmt department for a large division of a global employer.  We keep track of project status across our division, and also handle internal cross-departmental projects.

lenders.name: HARRISON & JOYCE
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people help themselves.

lenders.name: Joan
lenders.loan_because: We are a global community and what effects one, effects us all.  I've had people help me get on my feet in the past and I am now in a position to do the same for someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is merely a means to an end.  What really matters is the connections we make with one another.

lenders.name: nanhana
lenders.loan_because: I like Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: Grade 7 randomista.

lenders.name: www.InfinityMagic.com
lenders.loan_because: I would like others to have the same opportunity I have had to try and make a business work and better their lives and those around them.
lenders.occupational_info: We have thousands of magic tricks available to be purchased online and shipped to your home.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: access to basic financial services is a human right.
lenders.occupational_info: General management activities at a leading CDFI that provides financing to low-income families, nonprofits, and struggling community credit unions.

lenders.name: Colleen
lenders.loan_because: Supporting hard-working individuals seeking to better the lives of their families and communities is an honor.

lenders.name: Dorota
lenders.loan_because: it is a great and easy way to help others.

lenders.name: Urantia Book friend
lenders.loan_because: My Father says be generous to our brothers and sisters, and we are indeed all brothers and sisters in the Fathers house.
lenders.occupational_info: I do financial papers for the government

lenders.name: Raj
lenders.loan_because: That's the least I can do. We all have our excuses for not contributing enough and then the days go by. With each passing day, opportunities are lost; for the borrowers, it's their survival and survival of many other who depend on them.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is related to improving the TV watching experience.

lenders.name: Agnes
lenders.loan_because: Micro credits make a huge impact on some peoples lives - it's the best form of tunneling money to where it's most needed - best of luck to your business!

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because: I strongly believe that I was blessed to be born into a country that offers me a safe, stable life in freedom - with the opportunity to make a living for me and my family. So I want to give back to people who have to struggle.
lenders.occupational_info: I am translating medical reports and helping patients in a big hospital.

lenders.name: Peng Wu
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people making a better life. I lend though this website because I can become a lender starting as little as 25 USD.
lenders.occupational_info: Now I am working in a very small company as both accountant and office clerk.

lenders.name: Julian and Paloma
lenders.loan_because: We  want to help people who have interesting dreams for their futures.

lenders.name: Jess
lenders.loan_because:
I have been very blessed and the best thing we can do is pay it forward. 

Be the change you want to see in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: When children get sick, I make appointments for them to see a doctor.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: life is a bucket brigade
lenders.occupational_info: I make bread

lenders.name: Stephanie and kai
lenders.loan_because: We believe in the power of individuals to change their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: Teacher, mom and dad of two children.

lenders.name: Chris & Jody
lenders.loan_because: We want to help other women in world to have a successful business
lenders.occupational_info: I design and sew window treatments.

lenders.name: Ulli and Angelika
lenders.loan_because: It is a wonderful idea... and the money goes on and on... and it goes directly to the people who need it ... and... and... and...

lenders.name: Petter
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. And I do it because I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with property projects around Norway.

lenders.name: Akiko M
lenders.loan_because:
You must be the change you want to see in the world.

Mahatma Gandhi

lenders.name: Chippindall's
lenders.loan_because: for such a small amount people can band together to make a big difference to someone else in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a young Australian Family and we want to teach our children to be thankful for what they have - and to always look to help others.

lenders.name: Debra
lenders.loan_because: It feels great to help other people achieve their goals.

lenders.name: Aaron
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a great idea!
lenders.occupational_info: Fix computers, servers, and networks for companies.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I love people in our world we are one striving to live and b happy and have families to surround ourselves with love.
lenders.occupational_info: Find a way to help others take care of themselves

lenders.name: Karin
lenders.loan_because: I can and it makes me feel good to help people who are willing to help themselves

lenders.name: Julian
lenders.loan_because: I can!

lenders.name: Cathy & Jerry
lenders.loan_because: we want to support people trying to make a better life for themselves and their family

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I believe in preventative medicine, which is why I believe in Kiva.org....because to me the best way to alleviate global health and wellness issues is to confront the economic inequalities that cause them.

lenders.name: Marilyn
lenders.loan_because: its an easy, practical way to help someone work towards a better life.

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: I support the arts worldwide and want to see traditional arts and crafts survive.
lenders.occupational_info: I train English language teachers around the world.

lenders.name: Bob
lenders.occupational_info: I make the computers work in a public school.

lenders.name: Isabel
lenders.loan_because: We can! So beeing able to help bounds us in honour!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a management assistant speaking 5 languages and working for a SME in Germany.

lenders.name: Debbie and Ric
lenders.loan_because: I believe my little bit of extra money can make a big change in someone else's life.
lenders.occupational_info: My research focused on how schools can meet the needs of high school students who are recovering from drug and alcohol addiction.

lenders.name: Roland
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: bille
lenders.loan_because: i can

lenders.name: Kristina & Roland
lenders.loan_because: We believe in the value of these loans for the people for the world economy in a bigger scale.

lenders.name: Cindy
lenders.loan_because: my best friend introduced me to kiva and Yunus's book on microlending.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach 3rd and 4th year dental students clinical dentistry and also work in private practice.

lenders.name: Zac and Kerri
lenders.loan_because: We have been blessed by the generosity of others and because we are inspired by the stories of these entrepreneurs.
lenders.occupational_info: Zac makes movies.  Kerri works at a college.  We both seek to create innovative ways to inspire, educate, and entertain others.

lenders.name: Lynne
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed and want to share what I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies develop new medical devices and products.

lenders.name: G&R
lenders.loan_because: We like helping others.
